actions.description: 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, taking 12 (3d8 + 3) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Psychic Crush

actions.description:
The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
1/day each: suggestion

2/day each: mage armor (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

languages: Deep Speech plus the languages of the Humanoid it is imitating, telepathy 120 ft.
name: Psurlon Ringer [BAM]

specialTraits.description: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Aberrant Mind
